        action - - Action type.

      • has

        public boolean has(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                   String node)
        All permission checks should go through here. Returns true if a player has a certain permission node.
        Parameters:
        player - - Player to check
        node - - Permission node to check for
        Returns:
        true if the player has this permission node.
